Package it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card

Class PlayableCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card.GameCard
it.polimi.ingsw.am24.model.card.PlayableCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCard, ResourceCard
public abstract class PlayableCard extends GameCard
The PlayableCard class represents a specific type of game card that extends GameCard. It includes points and methods related to the card's gameplay.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayableCard

      public PlayableCard(int imageId, Symbol[] symbols, Kingdom kingdom, int points)
      Constructs a PlayableCard with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      imageId - the ID of the image associated with the card
      symbols - an array of symbols to be assigned to the card's corners
      kingdom - the kingdom associated with the card
      points - the points assigned to the card

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Retrieves the type of the card.
      Returns:

    • getCardSide

      public PlayableCard getCardSide(boolean front)
      Retrieves the side of the card based on whether it is front or back.
      Parameters:
      front - true if retrieving the front side, false for the back side
      Returns:
      the card side (front or back)

    • checkRequirementsMet

      public boolean checkRequirementsMet(HashMap<Symbol,Integer> visibleSymbols)
      Checks if the requirements for playing the card are met based on visible symbols.
      Parameters:
      visibleSymbols - the map of visible symbols to check against card requirements
      Returns:
      true if requirements are met, false otherwise
